description: A list of the pricing plans that are associated with a pricing rule.

parameters.name: PricingRuleArn
parameters.description: The pricing rule Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for which associations will be listed.

nested_items.name: BillingPeriod
nested_items.description: The pricing plan billing period for which associations will be listed.

nested_items.name: PricingRuleArn
nested_items.description: The pricing rule Amazon Resource Name (ARN) for which associations will be listed.

nested_items.name: PricingPlanArns
nested_items.description: The list containing pricing plans that are associated with the requested pricing rule.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to be used on subsequent calls.
